title: I've been Re-patching and Reinstalling Over and Over again and just Kept getting Bugsplat.
body:
So I've sat all night trying to figure out why my League Alpha Client Stopped working, I've never had this problem. Whenever I took my champ (In custom game) because I didn't want to ruin people's game, and when I took my champion it went into loading screen and just got Bugsplat if someone knows whats going on then DM me.

Someone Please Help me

This is My Hardware ETC
https://gyazo.com/cb914274af9ba95b018c8524ce7be097 
https://gyazo.com/13a28dc47ee67ac7052f2fe0bcd28351 
https://gyazo.com/a7b5698b9fd9ab65c3a9cbd6a852d042 
https://gyazo.com/b3147c9f79da2d1aaaadfe69965b8ed6

replies.body: Please post your r3d file the most recent one. I think I may have a fix.

(I have the same bugsplat problem)

It looks like your particular Bugsplat is caused by a few different lines, but mostly, it looks like League cannot identify your display device, therefore is unable to render properly, according to these lines in your r3d log:

000002.559| ALWAYS| GPU Manufacturer:
000002.559| ALWAYS| GPU Memory:
000002.559| ALWAYS| GPU Driver Version:

I recommend following [**this specific step**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1) inside our FPS Guide to ensure that your driver is updated and installed properly. Let me know if this resolved your Bugsplat, friend. ^.^
I updated my drivers and they're installed correctly but it still happens. It still has the same problem though....

I'd say that there's an issue with your driver installation or something else exacerbating the issue, then. I'd like you to run some system logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). In this way, we'll be able to get one of our tech specialists working with you to further troubleshoot this issue.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Nevermind, I've just submitted it with a note saying that the clock may or may not be right.

How do I run the .msi file I download for the hextech repair tool as admin? When I try to do it thru the right-click, it doesn't show up. And when I try to go into the command prompt and do msiexec /a "blah blah blah" it comes up with an error.

I can tell you that the problem is probably with you monitor because the log says that it your settings for your monitor are 1920 x 1080 which for some monitors doesnt support. I suggest checking your monitor's default resolution and then going to your config file and changing to the same. That's what fixed my problem if you need proof it's a fix.

Did you change out your monitor for a different one lately, or were there any other sorts of hardware changes lately? If not, then I suspect this issue is caused by a common culprit such as Display driver or hardware issues. Luckily, we've consolidated the most common fixes for this issue inside our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so you don't have to hunt all over the vast space of the internet for some solutions.

Please let me know if those steps caused any change for you.
